title: Zirna & Open Source - Orbital Temple-ah hian a awm a
heading: Zirna & Open Source te a ni

intro.paragraph1: Orbital Temple mission atana technology siam zawng zawng chu open source a ni ang a , Portuguese , English , Spanish , leh Hindi tawngin online ah hman theih a ni ang a , hei hian Global South a space exploration hmasawnna a tichak ang Mission leh project tharte chuan Orbital Temple hi anmahni artistic emaw scientific experiment atan lungphum atan an hmang thei a ni.
intro.paragraph2: Educational mission kalpui mek zingah Orbital Temple hian satellite siam dan leh kahchhuah dan tur multilingual course a thlawna a buatsaih dawn a ni. Satellite technology chungchang zir leh a taka hman theihna hun remchang tak a ni ang. Kum 16 chunglam tu pawhin anmahni satellite an siam thei dawn a, space-a art chanchin te, electronics, mechanics leh space science-a concept bulpui te, project-te sum hman dan tur leh orbit-a satellite-te nena inbiakpawhna tur antenna siam dan te an zir thei dawn a ni.

spaceGap.heading: Hei Hi A Pawimawh Chhan: The Space Gap
spaceGap.paragraph1: "Space Gap" tih hian space exploration hmanga technology lama chanvo an hmuh theihna tur ram changkang zawkte leh heng technology hmang thei lo hnam changkang zawkte inkara inthenna a kawk a ni. Global South-a ramte chuan satellite technology hmanga information siam chhuah basic access an neih theih nan ramdang sorkar emaw company emaw hnenah sum tam tak an pe tur a ni.
spaceGap.paragraph2: Space technology hian hlawkna pawimawh tak a pe a: satellite hian dan loa thing phun, dan loa sangha man, leh dan loa ramsa sumdawnna dona kawngah a pui a, hei hian kum khatah dollar tluklehdingawn 73 chuang a tling a ni Khaw lum leh khaw vawt, tui siam chhuah, leh ei leh in lama harsatna chungchangah thu pawimawh tak tak an pe a ni. Satellite hian precision irrigation leh agriculture technique a siam thei a, natural disaster venna kawngah pawh a pui bawk. Space industry hian kum 2030 -ah chuan hna maktaduai khat thleng a siam thei a, chutih rualin heng hun remchangte hi Global South-a mi tam tak tan chuan a la thleng thei lo.
spaceGap.paragraph3: Open-source technology leh zirna pein, space-a hman theihna chu democratize-a siam a, thlah tharte chu van piah lama mumang nei thei tura chakna pek kan tum a ni.

empowering.heading: Next Generation te chakna pek
empowering.intro: Space explorer thlah tharte chu anmahni satellite siam leh thlawh chhuah dan tur kan zirtir ang a, thupui pawimawh tak tak kan huam ang a, chung zingah chuan:

topics.history: Space-a art chanchin: Artistic satellite leh space-based artwork-te thlah kal zel hriatthiamna.
topics.concepts: Thupui ber: ArtSat (artistic satellite), Open Source space technology, leh Space Gap te hi a ni.
topics.missions: Space missions: Mission conceptualize leh design dan te, a execute tur team din dan te.
topics.electronics: Space-a electronics: Space environment-a nung thei leh thawk thei electronic components chungchanga ngaihdan bulpui.
topics.mechanics: Mechanics in space: Satellite design atana structural leh mechanical mamawh hriatthiamna.
topics.orbits: Orbit leh launcher: Orbit chi hrang hrang leh i mission atana launch provider thlan dan tur.
topics.financing: Financing strategy: I satellite thlawhchhuahna tur sum leh pai leh resources i hmuh theih dan tur. He course hian i thlawhna thlawh chhuahna tur sum hmuhna tur resources a pe ang a, zirlai te chu international institution atanga program leh grant zawng turin a pui ang a, chu chuan scientist naupang leh zirlai te chu an satellite te space-a thawn chhuahna kawngah a pui ang.
topics.groundStation: Ground station siam dan: Orbital Temple leh satellite dangte nena inbiakpawhna tur antenna siam dan.

technology.heading: The Technology: PocketQube Satellite hmanga siam a ni
technology.paragraph1: Zirlaite hian PocketQube satellite hmanga hnathawh an zir dawn a, hei hi nanosatellite standard a ni a, 5cm3 chauh a ni a, 250g thleng a rit a ni. An lian lo hle nachungin PocketQubes hi hmanraw chak tak, Leilung enfiah, enkawl leh inbiakpawhna nei thei an ni.
technology.paragraph2: Heng compact satellite te hian khawvel tak takah hmanna tam tak an nei a, climate change chungchanga scientific research atanga intercontinental communication thlengin an hmang thei a ni. An te zawk a, an rit zawk avangin an siam leh tlangzarh pawh a man tlawm zawk a, khawvel puma zirlai, zirchiangtute leh artist-te tan hmun a awlsam zawk a ni.

globalAccess.heading: Global Access, Global South atanga tan a ni
globalAccess.paragraph1: Course hi kum 16 aia upa tan a awm dawn a , a thlawna hman theih a ni ang . Portuguese , Spanish , English , leh Hindi -a content hmangin kan tan a, program a lo thang zel angin tawng dang pawha tihpun tum a ni.
globalAccess.paragraph2: Kan mission hi Global South atanga tan niin khawvel pum huap a ni a, space explorer thlah tharte chu khawvel kil tin atanga lo kal an nih theih nan kan enkawl a ni.

callToAction.heading: Hei Hi Tih Tih Tih Turin Min Tanpui Rawh
callToAction.content: He zirna programme hi tunah hian siam mek a ni. Space technology hman theihna democratize tura kan vision ang tho partner leh donor kan zawng mek a ni. Nangmah emaw, i pawl emaw hian he hmalakna hi i thlawp duh a nih chuan kan support page hi tlawh la, partnership opportunity chungchang zir rawh.
